channel.title: Help (Emulous)
channel.description:
I havnt coded RSPS in Sooooooooo long.
I decided to start coding again, and now im using Emulous as a base. I just have a few quick questions.
When i turn on Run.bat It says: Starting emulous on 0.0.0.0:43594
Now... How do I change the server IP too my IP? Like.. what file, I've checked every file.
And, what client should i use? I have Bluurs original deob and hayzie said thats the one he used, but It like dc's me when I type in the IP "0.0.0.0" which is what the server is defaulty set on.

item.title: Help (Emulous)
item.dc:creator: @wwe4eva wwe4eva
item.description:
@wwe4eva wrote:

[quote=“rofllewisrofl, post:9, topic:320026”]I didn’t ask for an asshole answer, and I was being polite. I obviously just didn’t get what you were saying, some people that don’t spend there lifes on computers need things broken down into english instead of (023523623623()INPUTdglakok2o34t-2i3-0it-wie-;;;;

Anyway, none of these worked. I’ll go to R-S, people there actually understand.[/quote]

And this is why the fact of “Half of the Moparscape community are retarted” is true.

Read full topic

item.title: Help (Emulous)
item.dc:creator: @rofllewisrofl rofllewisrofl
item.description:
@rofllewisrofl wrote:

I didn’t ask for an asshole answer, and I was being polite. I obviously just didn’t get what you were saying, some people that don’t spend there lifes on computers need things broken down into english instead of (023523623623()INPUTdglakok2o34t-2i3-0it-wie-;;;;

Anyway, none of these worked. I’ll go to R-S, people there actually understand.

Read full topic

item.title: Help (Emulous)
item.dc:creator: @kieran-b kieran-b-
item.description:
@kieran-b wrote:

ctrl f 127.0.0.1 and change it to your ip

Read full topic

item.title: Help (Emulous)
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Go f yourself. Try being polite if you want your damn answer.

Read full topic

item.title: Help (Emulous)
item.dc:creator: @rofllewisrofl rofllewisrofl
item.description:
@rofllewisrofl wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:5, topic:320026”]No sense?

and your external ip if you’re going to distribute your client.[/quote]

Yeah no sence. I told you i havn’t coded RSPS in such a long time, speak english please, not java.

My eternal IP? how am i going to use that? I type my IP from no-ip.com into the client and it says “error connecting to server” because the source needs to have my ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Help (Emulous)
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

No sense?

and your external ip if you're going to distribute your client.

Read full topic

item.title: Help (Emulous)
item.dc:creator: @rofllewisrofl rofllewisrofl
item.description:
@rofllewisrofl wrote:

That makes no sence.

If i want to host my server how are people supposed to log in?

People cant type in localhost to connect my server… They need my IP- projectatlas.no-ip.biz

Read full topic

item.title: Help (Emulous)
item.dc:creator: @kieran-b kieran-b-
item.description:
@kieran-b wrote:

wats your msn and ill fix everthing for you

Read full topic

item.title: Help (Emulous)
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

You dont have to change the ip server sided, just in the client.
Use 127.0.0.1 for testing purposes, and your eternal ip if you’re going to distribute your client.

Read full topic
